name: Hard Rock CAfe
author: MSSINGNO
notes:
Yet another CA with Hey, Trunade.
Feel it’s much more stable running 2 Saffira 1 Dakini rather than the 2 Dakini version.
Barely drew into trunade but since it came out in the new box, I’ve noticed a fall in popularity of 3 cards that majorly disrupted CA on the ladder.
Econ, Floodgate and Wall of D.
